
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/qq21497936/p/18634220" title="发布于 2024-12-26 21:29">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">硬件开发笔记（三十二）：TPS54331电源设计（五）：原理图BOM表导出、元器件封装核对</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h1>前言</h1>
</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  一个12V转5V、3.3V和4V的电源电路设计好了，下一步导出BOM表，二次核对元器件型号封装，这是可以生产前的最后一步了。</p>
</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h1><a id="BOM_5"></a>导出BOM表</h1>
</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_6"></a>步骤一：打开原理图</h2>
</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  打开项目，双击点开原理图：<br>  &nbsp;<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449497-701895187.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_10"></a>步骤二：报告-元器件列表</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449616-1045741398.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449624-1577083169.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>    列宽一点，板子元器件种类规格不多的时候，导出的东西也不多，因为像电阻电容等一些是标准的，主要重点是核对非标准的器件。<br>  原理图会检测生成消息，这个图还有点问题，要确认下：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449429-1991437629.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449499-84417316.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449652-2051259423.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449689-373144175.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  检查板子没问题：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449671-1908012930.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  重新看下原理图：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449664-260059135.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  是3V3和3.3V的区别，改成VCC3V3即可，没有错误了：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449799-219829330.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  选择预览，出现“入坑一：导出失败，找不到excel组件”，解决后：<br>  在这里插入图片描述</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_37"></a>步骤三：选择导出模板和导出的信息</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  几个模板都看了，还不如不用。<br>  至于导出的列信息，我们主要是引脚设计到的元器件参数信息、库、元器件序号和引脚封装类型，这四个就可以进行核对了。<br>  所以我们可以右键列头属性，q这个是数量，也要选：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449829-82910347.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_43"></a>步骤四：预览导出</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449801-2130180483.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  最终预览如下：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449733-114684029.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  然后导出：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449757-1512312983.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  选择路径导出即可。</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h1><a id="_56"></a>审核过程</h1>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  这是为了内部流程的完整，</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_58"></a>步骤一：将表增加审核列</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  复制一份，保留原始的：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449732-1931570380.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  原始表：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449821-1582548672.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  根据流程增加修改表格如下：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449735-600505468.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_68"></a>步骤二：具体审核过程，逐条过</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<ul>
<li>核对原理图库与实际元器件的引脚尺寸，这个是因为封装库是新建的，依靠datasheet，为了确保可靠，确认一次，后续再使用，已经核对过的就不核对了。</li>
<li>核对原理图与库引脚的映射关系，这里主要是指向相关的引脚顺序，确认引脚的正确，这一步是往后所有图审核都需要进行的。<br>硬件研发与软件的区别，错误则会导致打板，贴片费用周期浪费，进而导致错误成本增加。</li>

</ul>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="470uF_75"></a>核对铝电解电容470uF（纠正）</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449662-1627520993.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212450012-812085685.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  电容模型贴片大小是4x7mm左右的，这里470uf的是10x10.2mm的，所以这里封装是错误的，需要重新更换合适的，考虑到电压输入限制12V，所以给16V：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449827-1320078373.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  电压都低于12V，换成16V470uF的，这里注意不同品牌的大小是不一样的：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449934-1547221488.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"><br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449859-86146017.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449778-1055699843.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449878-517494748.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449834-759197247.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  还得更新原理图库，PCB板子：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449832-275613033.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  重新调整：</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="120uF_98"></a>核对铝电解电容120uF（纠正）</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  原来是120uF25V改为100uF25V，在同一个地方买不到同系列的，保持一致，所以更改了：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449767-521458040.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449921-781515374.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449901-2124739266.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  没找到3D模型：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449765-256443255.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  修改好后：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449838-1856104240.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="68uH_112"></a>核对电感6.8uH</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212450039-1739395804.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212450051-2026371648.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_117"></a>核对整理二极管</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449974-1674370941.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449845-1758647709.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449761-1054051036.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="TPS54311D_124"></a>核对TPS54311D电源芯片</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449980-490005441.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  管脚映射：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449914-133799610.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449969-924549514.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449839-1908820799.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  其他都是统一封装了，不是特殊元器件了。</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_135"></a>步骤三：二次更新库</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  从库更新原理图，从库更新PCB，确保无疏漏元器件，然后最终如下：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212450027-125424531.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449904-1205779026.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"><br>  最后BOM表如下：<br>  <br><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449910-421204974.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">&nbsp;</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h1><a id="_146"></a>入坑</h1>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="excel_147"></a>入坑一：导出失败，找不到excel组件</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h3><a id="_148"></a>问题</h3>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  找不到excel组件。<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449896-1592211297.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h3><a id="_152"></a>原因</h3>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  未知</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h3><a id="_154"></a>解决</h3>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  换一个xlsx的配置：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449918-986552419.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  解决了：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449892-1749615196.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h2><a id="_160"></a>入坑二：扩展板子失败</h2>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h3><a id="_161"></a>问题</h3>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  电容加大，所以扩大了板子，但是使用机械层石板</p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<h3><a id="_163"></a>解决</h3>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  按数字1：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449942-1300084373.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
<div class="cl-preview-section">
<p>  32然后才能出现“重新定义板子形状”：<br>  <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1971530/202412/1971530-20241226212449933-1579831534.png" alt="在这里插入图片描述"></p>

</div>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
